Installation
============

Requirements
------------
FoxPuppet will work with python 2.7, and 3.6

Install FoxPuppet
-----------------
To install FoxPuppet using `pip <https://pip.pypa.io/>`_:

.. code-block:: bash

  $ pip install FoxPuppet

To install from source:

.. code-block:: bash

  $ python setup.py develop
